patterns: Tell me about the welcome speech
Can you provide details about the welcome event?
What's happening during the welcome speech?
What do I need to know about the welcome session?
responses: The Welcome Speech will take place on 16 January 2025 from 07:00 PM to 08:30 PM at Block C, James Cook University Singapore. It will include speeches by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor of Singapore and the Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching & Student Engagement. After that, there will be a short session called JCU 101, followed by breakout room activities.

patterns: Tell me about the academic briefing
What should I expect from the academic advising session?
When is the academic session and who is conducting it?
Can you give me info about academic briefing?
responses: The Academic Briefing is scheduled for 16 January 2025 from 07:25 PM to 08:30 PM. It will be conducted by the Associate Professor of Counselling, the Academic Head of Social and Health Sciences, and the Academic Head of Business

patterns: Which courses can attend the welcome speech?
What programs are invited to the event?
Who is eligible to join the orientation?
responses: The following part-time programs are eligible to attend the orientation events: Diploma of Higher Education (Psychological Science), Bachelor of Psychological Science, Master of Guidance and Counselling, and Business Programs.
